title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include an acceptable description. Acceptable descriptions include the following.

· A longer mRNA half-life is associated with more protein.

· There is a positive correlation/relationship.

The response includes an acceptable description. Acceptable descriptions include the following.

· A longer mRNA half-life is associated with more protein.

· There is a positive correlation/relationship.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not support the hypothesis by stating that the half-lives of the two mRNAs MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGTbGaaeOuaiaab6eacaqGbbGaae4Caaaa@3D4C@ are the same, but the amount of protein produced from the mRNA with modified cap I MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGjbaaaa@39C8@ is more than (four times as much as) that produced from the mRNA with the normal cap.

The response supports the hypothesis by stating that the half-lives of the two mRNAs MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGTbGaaeOuaiaab6eacaqGbbGaae4Caaaa@3D4C@ are the same, but the amount of protein produced from the mRNA with modified cap I MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGjbaaaa@39C8@ is more than (four times as much as) that produced from the mRNA with the normal cap.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include an acceptable explanation. Acceptable explanations include the following.

· Protein production from the DNA requires (transcription) factors to initiate transcription.

· Protein production from the mRNA does not depend on (correct posttranscriptional) processing of the pre-mRNA.

· The cells may be unable to transcribe the DNA (while mRNA can be directly translated).

The response includes an acceptable explanation. Acceptable explanations include the following.

· Protein production from the DNA requires (transcription) factors to initiate transcription.

· Protein production from the mRNA does not depend on (correct posttranscriptional) processing of the pre-mRNA.

· The cells may be unable to transcribe the DNA (while mRNA can be directly translated).
